messages.msgSnippet: Milt- Can t seem to get this posted. Have tried resetting my account b ut it doesn t work and I don t have much time. Can you post it for me. thanks -t All- If
messages.messageBody:
Milt-
Can't seem to get this posted. Have tried resetting my account b
ut it
doesn't work and I don't have much time.
Can you post it for me. thanks
-t

All-
If you aren't sure which day to attend, here is more info to help
you
decide...

2004 TOKEN KAI

I'll be there all day everyday...
-t
